alert.note: Alert for Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:14PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TANEY...CHRISTIAN AND NORTHEASTERN STONE COUNTIES... At 613 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highlandville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Sparta, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Branson West, Spokane, Oldfield, Elkhead, Chestnutridge, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center, Ponce de Leon, Chadwick and Linden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
